scripts.generateOverrides: node helpers/src/GenerateOverrides.res.js && rescript format ./packages/rescript-mui-material/src/types/Overrides.res && rescript format ./packages/rescript-mui-lab/src/Overrides.res
scripts.publishLab: yarn clean && cd packages/rescript-mui-lab && yarn publish --access public
scripts.publishMui: yarn clean && cd packages/rescript-mui-material && yarn publish --access public
scripts.publishSystem: yarn clean && cd packages/rescript-mui-system && yarn publish --access public
scripts.publishDatePickers: yarn clean && cd packages/rescript-mui-x-date-pickers && yarn publish --access public
